## Kernel Checklist
If modifying kernel/:
- [ ] No new imports from execution/agents/cognitive
- [ ] 100% test coverage maintained
- [ ] RFC approved (for axiom/canon changes)
- [ ] Governance board notified

- [ ] Tests pass
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Linting passes
- [ ] Type checking passes
